skins.shipDescription: La Galissonni¨¨re-class light cruiser ¨C La Galissonni¨¨re.
skins.selfIntroduction: I was assigned to Vichya's "High Seas Force" back during the war, I think? Don't think I ever set sail though, due to fuel shortages... Y'know what? You're probably gonna get a quicker rundown if you just ask Dunkerque.
skins.acquisition: Vichya, Sardegna, Iron Blood... and now this place? Ah well, doesn't matter to me 'long as I get to have a good time. Anyway, I'm La Galissonni¨¨re from the Vichya Dominion. Nice meetin' you!
skins.login: Finally! You're back! I thought I was gonna rust up from boredom while you were gone. Gimme a task, any task, and I'll do it.
skins.details: You lookin' to have some fun? You mean with me, or my weapon?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Just sitting in the office, boooored out of my mind while the Commander goes ham on a ton of paperwork. *siiigh*...
skins.secretaryIdle2: If the goal's to beat the enemy, then what's wrong with me bashing them with my rigging? I swear, you fuss over the strangest stuff, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Can't say I'm keen on planning stuff... It's like, you make a plan, but it always changes, y'know?
skins.secretaryTouch: Touch me all you want! As long as you don't mind getting hurt.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Listen, unlike a certain someone from the Templar Knights, "dirty work" is my specialty... Wanna know more?

skins.shipDescription: Summertime means pool time! Oh, hey, Commander. What are you waiting for? Come over and let's have fun!
skins.acquisition: Summertime means pool time! Oh, hey, Commander. What are you waiting for? Come over and let's have fun!
skins.login: I'm not gonna swim all day, so I'll just skip the warm-ups. Should be no biggie!
skins.details: I'll throw the swim ring at you if you get close to drowning. Relax, knowin' you, I'm sure you'll catch it!
skins.secretaryIdle1: We don't really NEED to swim just 'cause we've got a pool, do we? Nothing wrong with just dipping our toes, you know.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Over here, Commander! Ka-splash! Ahahahah! Feelin' refreshed now?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hmm... Feels a little weird, not having my hands full with something...
skins.secretaryTouch: Whoa there, trying to startle me? Sadly for you, I saw that coming from miles away~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Ahahah. So you wanna practice holding your breath, is that it, Commander?
